formattedAddress: 111 Wadsworth Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 111 Wadsworth Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text:
Delicious tres leches! Passion fruit, guava are my favorite but they are all delicious. The best tres leches!

I have also ordered from flavors and layers cakes as well and they are truly delicious.  The pastry and caramel cremes are out of this world. This past weekend I ordered ‚Äòcup-tails‚Äô (cupcakes with a shot of whiskey) and they were amazing.  They not only looked amazing and matched my whiskey/age to perfection theme, but they were to die for.  The buttercream with a hint of dulce de leche does NOT taste like the usual buttercream (which at times can be a bit greasy and tasteless), flavors and layers buttercream is like no other.  Everyone raved about the cuptails and said they were the best cupcakes they have ever eaten.  The shot of whiskey was also the perfect opportunity to do the usual shot with the birthday boy in a non-traditional manner.

Thank you flavors and layers for always providing the best product and service and being the highlight of every event (or just the highlight of anyone‚Äôs day).

originalText.text: Everything is done with so much dedication and attention to detail. It shows in the texture of the ‚Äúsupiro‚Äùand moisture of the cake. It‚Äôs all natural from scratch no wonder it is the best tres leches on the east coast. I‚Äôve travel from Boston to Miami and this by far is the best quality and best tres leches that I‚Äôve tasted. That‚Äôs why I love coming back to try different flavors. Highly recommend to everyone!

originalText.text: I ordered a couple of three Leche dessert. The flavor were amazing and well balanced. Not over powering sweet or a sugar bomb. The texture, color, sweetness and taste were on point. Pricing is fair and quality is remarkable. I will definitely keeping ordering and try out all of their delicious dessert.

text.text: I ordered a couple of three Leche dessert. The flavor were amazing and well balanced. Not over powering sweet or a sugar bomb. The texture, color, sweetness and taste were on point. Pricing is fair and quality is remarkable. I will definitely keeping ordering and try out all of their delicious dessert.

originalText.text: Flavors and layers did not disappoint. First of all, the customer service is top of the notch. There was a minor misunderstanding and the owner went above and beyond to make sure that my cake was ready for my birthday. The owner really cares for her customers and that speaks volume!!! She is a sweetheart and it was a pleasure to work with her!....I ordered the ciruela charquito with dulce de leche and it was deliciously amazing. Everyone wanted more üòÇü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. originalText.text: The best tres leches I‚Äôve ever had! Not overly sweet and so soft. Nothing like those hard wet cakes they sell everywhere. I‚Äôm obsessed with all the flavors , it‚Äôs so hard to chose a fav!
